title: xView Satellite Object Detection
description: Large-scale overhead imagery object detection (Lam et al., arXiv 2018). Detect 60 object classes including vehicles, buildings, and infrastructure from satellite images.
citation:
@article{lam2018xview,
    title = "{xView}: Objects in Context in Overhead Imagery",
    author = "Lam, Darius  and Kuzma, Richard  and McGee, Kevin  and Dooley, Samuel  and Laiber, Michael  and Ber, Matthew  and Manjunatha, Varun  and Naber, Jonathan",
    journal = "arXiv preprint arXiv:1802.07856",
    year = "2018",
    url = "https://arxiv.org/abs/1802.07856"
}
